title: Data Visualizer and AutoML
description: A Streamlit web app for data visualization, preprocessing, and automated predictive modeling with performance metrics and model downloads.

title: Language Detetction Web App
description: A Flask web app for language detection using a machine learning model, deployed with FastAPI and Docker for efficient API handling and containerized deployment.

title: Abusive Language Detection
description: Machine learning model for abusive language detection, trained on a Twitter dataset, with comparison of traditional models and deep learning approaches, highlighting LSTM for improved performance.
